duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality massage and body therapy treatments to guests at Affinity Cosmedic in North Peoria.
Maintain cleanliness of equipment and rooms, as well as, restock of linens and products between and at the end of each working shift.
Communicate with clients to identify their needs and set clear expectations
Stay connected to clients throughout each session to achieve the goals of each service
Recommend follow-up visits and additional services to help clients pursue their wellness goals

education_certification.credential: Graduated from an accredited massage school with sufficient hours based on massage modality (1 year experience preferred)
Specialty certification from reputable organization in areas such as Swedish, deep tissue, sports massage, myofascial techniques, craniosacral, infant and pre-natal massage
